textBox.richText: We participated to the Face Detection on Hard Dataset competition organized at the International Joint Conference on Biometrics (IJCB 2011). The results will be presented at the conference and will appear in the proceedings: “Face and eye detection on hard datasets”,  J. Parris, M. Wilber, B. Helfin, H. Rara, A. El-barkouky, A. Farag, J. Movellan, M. Santana, J. Lorenzo, M.N. Teli, S. Marcel, C. Atanasoaei, and T. Boult.  In IEEE IAPR International Joint Conference on Biometrics (IJCB), 2011.
Face Detection on Hard Dataset Competition 2011
